Package game.weapons

Class UpgradableGameWeapon

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameEntity
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items.Item
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.weapons.WeaponItem
game.weapons.GameWeapon
game.weapons.UpgradableGameWeapon
All Implemented Interfaces:
Printable, Weapon, UpgradableItemInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
Knife, Sword
public class UpgradableGameWeapon extends GameWeapon implements UpgradableItemInterface
An abstract class for an upgradable weapon for the game

  • Constructor Details

    • UpgradableGameWeapon

      public UpgradableGameWeapon(String name, char displayChar, int damage, String verb, int hitRate, Upgradable upgradable)
      Constructor for UpgradableGameWeapon without an ability.
      Parameters:
      name - name of weapon
      displayChar - char to be displayed on the map
      damage - the damage to be dealt
      verb - a verb such as punch or kick
      hitRate - the chance to hit
      upgradable - what can be upgraded

    • UpgradableGameWeapon

      public UpgradableGameWeapon(String name, char displayChar, int damage, String verb, int hitRate, CreateAbility ability, Upgradable upgradable)
      Constructor for UpgradableGameWeapon with an ability.
      Parameters:
      name - name of weapon
      displayChar - char to be displayed on the map
      damage - the damage to be dealt
      verb - a verb such as punch or kick
      hitRate - the chance to hit
      ability - the ability
      upgradable - what can be upgraded

  • Method Details

    • damage

      public int damage()
      Accessor for damage done by this weapon. Only difference is that it is added by how much damage it has been upgraded by.
      Specified by:
      damage in interface Weapon
      Overrides:
      damage in class WeaponItem
      Returns:
      the damage

    • chanceToHit

      public int chanceToHit()
      Returns the chance to hit the target in integer. Only difference is that it is added by how much chance it has been upgraded by.
      Specified by:
      chanceToHit in interface Weapon
      Overrides:
      chanceToHit in class WeaponItem
      Returns:
      the chance to hit

    • toString

      public String toString()
      What should be printed instead by default. Only difference is that it shows how much it has been upgraded by.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Item
      Returns:
      the item and the level
